context.name: Arvid Haque
context.bio: Growing up in Bangladesh, Arvid got to witness what is lacking in society. During his school years he was in charge of a non-profit organization with the goal to promote anti-littering campaigns in his community. As a Finance Major, sports enthusiast, former martial arts instructor and now the Project Manager of Flames Consulting; Arvid hopes to utilize his knowledge and experiences to motivate his team members in every way possible.
